meanings.sent1: The royal family's dynastic history was well-documented.
meanings.sent2: The dynastic rule passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The dynastic lineage was so long that even the family dog had a royal title.
meanings.sent4: The influence of the dynastic tradition was deeply rooted in the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The dynastic connection was the key to understanding the country's history.

meanings.definition: characteristic of or relating to a succession of rulers from the same family
meanings.sent1: The dynastic power struggle caused tension within the royal family.
meanings.sent2: Dynastic disputes often led to political instability.
meanings.sent3: The dynastic rivalry over the throne made for an interesting plot in the play.
meanings.sent4: The dynastic bond between siblings was tested during the war.
meanings.sent5: The dynastic loyalty was unwavering even in times of crisis.

meanings.definition: pertaining to a ruling family or its succession of rulers
meanings.sent1: The dynastic portrait hung proudly in the grand hall.
meanings.sent2: Dynastic traditions were upheld with great reverence.
meanings.sent3: The dynastic banquet was a feast fit for a king.
meanings.sent4: The dynastic crown symbolized authority and power.
meanings.sent5: The dynastic legacy was a source of pride for the nation.
